cons: Entire facility needs to be updated

job_title: Patient Access Representative in Sebring, FL
pros: Friendly environment, great benefits, management actually cares about you.
cons: Registration department needs at least two people per shift. Sometimes workload is a lot for only one registrar in the ER.

pros: Non corporate feel. Management doesn’t harass you.
cons: Low pay, many of the day shift CNAs avoid their duties (when you have them), nurses frequently are overloaded with patients. There are nurses and CNAs who are very lazy but receive better treatment from nurse management because they are part of the clique. Other nurses are aware and it’s bad for morale.

review_title: Its a common CPhT job, you will be putting the cert to good use here with a heavy focus on sterile work and logging.
job_title: Certified Pharmacy Technician in Sebring, FL
pros: Due to understaffing here there are plenty of chances for overtime.
cons: Due to understaffing there may be mandatory overtime with little to no notice. Support for the pharmacy and it's needs are lacking. Supervisor for techs is allowed to behave in ways unbecoming of their station. Pay is too low for the work required. Lack of compassion for coworkers if they fall ill.

job_title: Patient Care Technician in Sebring, FL
pros: The staff was great. The pay was great. High energy to work here.
cons: They had problems staffing people correctly.

review_title: Good people to work with, but needs change in management
pros: good pay and benefits, most jobs are 12 hour shifts for nurses which gives you alot of off days
cons: schedules are made so far in advance, its hard to work around things on short notice

review_title: Very stressful and no management support
cons: Management is not supportive of staff, poor staffing, always short staffed, unsafe
